lead_paragraph: Desert X, as the show is to be called, will invite artists to respond to the California desert’s history, geology or mythology, or otherwise to create site-specific works.

byline.original: By JORI FINKEL, HILARIE M. SHEETS and ROBIN POGREBIN

snippet: Desert X, as the show is to be called, will invite artists to respond to the California desert’s history, geology or mythology, or otherwise to create site-specific works.

headline.main: A Desert Biennial Alongside Coachella Is in the Works

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival

abstract: Inside Art column; upcoming Desert X art event in Palm Springs, Calif, area is scheduled for February through April 2017 to coincide with Modernism Week and Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival; High Line elevated park will exhibit provocative multimedia works by 10 artists; Portland Museum of Art in Maine, which has 700 works by Winslow Homer, acquires its first interior scene by painter, along with painting by Andrew Wyeth.
